summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cost Analytics feature - both backend APIs and frontend sidebar integration are fully functional with excellent performance and user experience

minor_issues.issue: Generates unreasonable cost estimates for extreme edge cases (team size 100+)

passed_tests: Cost estimates endpoint working with multiple scenarios (/api/cost-analytics/cost-estimates)
Cost Analytics button found and clickable in sidebar
Cost Analytics sidebar opens and displays correctly
Portfolio Overview section functional and collapsible
Budget Alerts section functional with proper alert display
Cost Insights section functional with risk assessment
Cost Estimator form fully functional (project type, team size, duration)
Cost estimates generation and display working
Real portfolio data displayed: $9.2M budget, $4.4M spent, 47.7% utilization
Professional UI styling and responsive design

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All Cost Analytics sidebar functionality working perfectly
